pullRequest.title: [openhabcloud] Added Actions for sending notifications
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added Actions for sending notifications

This PR adds a bunch of actions to be used in NGRE:

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp github@christophweitkamp.de

nodes.bodyText: Does this need to be immediate?
